title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing user-facing web applications using modern technologies like React, Vue, or Angular.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our backend team to build scalable APIs and microservices. Experience with Node.js, Python, or Java required. Knowledge of databases and cloud platforms preferred.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Looking for a versatile Full Stack Developer to work on our web application. Must have experience with both frontend and backend technologies. Great opportunity for growth in a startup environment.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We need a DevOps Engineer to help manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and automation tools required.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Creative UI/UX Designer needed to design intuitive and beautiful user interfaces. Must have experience with Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and user research methodologies.
